assessment_item.title: AJ8IB8 Q6.A machinery is depreciated by ₹ 2,000 every year.  Which method is being used to calculate depreciation?
assessment_item.body:

A machinery is depreciated by ₹ 2,000 every year.  Which method is being used to calculate depreciation?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

Written down value method

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1256"},{"text":"

Straight line method

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1257"},{"text":"

Sum of years digit method

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1267"},{"text":"

None of these
